title: Vietnam developer proposes 15-year rescue for bank at heart of giant fraud, documents show
description:
*

Central bank pumps nearly $26 billion into SCB, documents show

*

Vietnam developer Sun Group proposes 15-year SCB revival

*

SCB's deposits have withered, huge capital hole, data show

*

Sun Group vows at least $120 million to recapitalise bank

By Francesco Guarascio

HANOI, March 18 (Reuter...
